table.name: Trinkets
table.caption: Trinkets
rows: A sharp tooth from a newborn Sea King.
A broken eternal pose that once pointed to a legendary location.
A small den den mushi that only repeats 'hello?'
A small wooden statue of an unknown pirate.
A half-torn sketch of an underwater map.
A fancy worn purple captain's hat.
A rainbow-colored scale from a mermaid.
A wax replica of a devil fruit.
A conch shell that sobs when you listen to it.
A playing card made of lead.
A seastone bullet that has lost its properties.
An ornament shaped like a captain's wheel.
A necklace locket that can't be opened.
A music box that plays an old sea shanty.
An oversized straw hat.
A small kaleidoscope.
A bent key with a skull emblem on it.
A jar with a small eel inside.
A sword hilt with familiar initials etched into it.
A rusted knife that belonged to a relative.
A small sketch of the last pirate king.
A cracked copper coin from a lost civilization.
A syringe containing apple juice.
A paint brush that slowly removes paint.
The leg of a large toad.
The tail tip of a crocodile.
A surgeon's scalpel.
A tiny symbol of a smiling face.
A small indestructible cube with a rune on it.
A red monkey's right paw.
A thin disk made of aluminum.
A poorly drawn jolly roger.
A candle that glows blue when lit.
A small vial containing mysterious red fluid.
A large broken dinosaur egg.
The wooden leg of a marine veteran.
An eye patch with a serpent symbol.
An unmelting snowball from a mysterious country.
A wheel of cheese with a mouse inside.
A square compass that points in random directions.
An iron tooth stuck inside a wooden apple.
A banner belonging to a certain clan.
A mug that colors any liquid inside it orange.
A broken lock shaped like a Sea King.
A chunk of rubber from a tire.
A ship in a bottle that wobbles occasionally.
A slightly melted dog figurine.
A worn comic book about super hero pirates.
A glove that could only fit a small fairy.
A t-shirt with a random English word on it.
A pair of glasses that are always too blurry.
An empty soda can from an unknown brand.
A glass snake eye.
An iron orb that lightly sticks to anything it touches.
A small lizard living in a pouch.
A pyrite bell attached to a string.
A small bronze gear from a toy.
A wooden yo-yo.
A baby octopus that squirts water.
A piece of rope that randomly ties itself into a knot.
Shoes that leave behind faint tracks of dirt.
A wooden tribal mask.
A lock of hair from a sulong mink.
A mechanical bird in a wooden birdhouse.
A beanstalk that sometimes grows.
An earring shaped like an anchor.
A tiny hairy spider that can walk on water.
A rough diagram of a fish's anatomy.
A used bazooka shell containing volcanic ash.
A ceramic bowl filled with small bones.
A stone parrot head that repeats its holder's most used word.
A lightning rod that glows dim blue.
A stuffed reindeer toy.
A blue banana peel.
A scarf that makes its wearer colder.
A perfectly symmetrical skipping stone.
A plastic flower that always smells authentic.
A stone tablet with a sun symbol painted on.
A stone tablet with a sun symbol painted on.
A tangerine tree sapling in a pot.
An arrowhead shaped like a beak.
A slingshot without a handle.
A skull-shaped helmet with an afro.
A single strip of sea cow beef jerkey.
A metallic fang coated in heavily diluted poison.
A playing dice with a 6 on every side.
A jack in the box with a smiling lion head inside.
A hand-sized toy robot that dances under sunlight.
A cigarette that never burns out.
A pamphlet detailing a far-away amusement park.
A diary written by a sailor with partially ruined pages.
A mirror that only reflects moonlight.
An incomplete globe.
A chart detailing all the known constellations.
A silk handkerchief that is always a bit damp.
A chunk of green salt rock.
A steel whistle that makes bird sounds.
A stick of incense that smells like home.
A child's drawing that gives you nightmares every time you see it.
A bright red clown nose.
